description: One-minute skill: What Is Decentralized Finance.

hook.text: Imagine a bank with no bankers. DeFi replaces financial middlemen with code that runs on blockchains.

buildup.text: Lending, borrowing, trading, and insurance â€” all rebuilt as open-source software anyone can use.

discovery.text: DeFi protocols run 24/7 with no holidays, no closing times, and no approval processes. Just connect a wallet.

twist.text: There's no customer support. If you make a mistake, there's no one to reverse the transaction.

climax.text: DeFi grew from zero to over $200 billion locked in protocols in just four years. Finance was being rewritten.

punchline.text: Banks without bankers. Finance without permission.
